about_the_game:
☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕

☕☕ This Hot Coffee DLC is not what you're thinking, you pervert. ☕☕

Did you like DEPO and do you want to help me to continue generating content for the game?

Wow, you are willing to buy the XXL coffee! It means a lot to me, thank you very much.💜

As a thank you, you will receive some online items of almost unique category:
- Techrat & Ancora emoji.
- Swim in coffee gesture.
- Coffee cup skin.
- DEPO Trail.
- 10000 Cokkoins
- Online name and messages in purple.

🤫 Hey... You will also give an XXL coffee inside the game to Meyers.

☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕☕
